subject: Physical Fitness
title: What Is Supercompensation
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: What Is Supercompensation.

hook.text: After a hard workout, you're weaker than before. Your muscles are damaged and fuel tanks are empty.

buildup.text: Given rest and nutrition, your body doesn't just repair â€” it rebuilds slightly stronger than before.

discovery.text: This overshoot is supercompensation. Train at the right moment and you stack gains on top of gains.

twist.text: Train too soon and you dig deeper into fatigue. Wait too long and the window closes.

climax.text: The art of training is timing your next session at the peak of supercompensation.

punchline.text: Get stronger not by training more, but by timing it right.

quiz.question: What is supercompensation?
options: The body rebuilding stronger than pre-workout levels
